attributes.action: Ensure South Yorkshire Fire Authority and South Yorkshire Fire and Rescue Service use the services of the NJC to negotiate an agreement to settle the current dispute
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: SYFA & SYFRS are to dismiss 744 operational firefighters because they will not sign a new contract that is being IMPOSED, as a tax payer, I feel every avenue to NEGOTIATE a settlement should be exhausted to ensure strike action can be lifted by the FBU. I am therefore asking that SYFRS & SYFA should agree to use the services of the National Joint Council (NJC) in order that this dispute can be brought to a NEGOTIATED agreement.  I feel it is the least they can do on behalf of all the Operational Firefighters in South Yorkshire and just as importantly for ALL the Tax payers of South Yorkshire.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
